parameter.name: oozie.service.uri
parameter.description: Oozie service URI for the Oozie API.
parameter.label: Oozie Service URI

parameter.name: webhdfs.url
parameter.description: Enter the WebHDFS FileSystem URI. Typically this is the dfs.namenode.http-address property in the hdfs-site.xml configuration. URL must be accessible from Ambari Server.
parameter.label: WebHDFS FileSystem URI

parameter.name: webhdfs.nameservices
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of nameservices. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.nameservices property
parameter.label: Logical name of the NameNode cluster

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenodes.list
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of namenodes for a given nameservice. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.ha.namenodes.[nameservice] property
parameter.label: List of NameNodes

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenode.rpc-address.list
parameter.description: Comma separated RPC address for name nodes.
parameter.label: Comma separated NameNode RPC Addresses

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenode.http-address.list
parameter.description: Comma separated WebHDFS address for name nodes.
parameter.label: Comma separated NameNode HTTP (WebHDFS) Addresses

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenode.https-address.list
parameter.description: Comma separated WebHDFS Https addresses for name nodes.
parameter.label: Comma separated NameNode HTTPS (WebHDFS) Addresses

parameter.name: webhdfs.client.failover.proxy.provider
parameter.description: The Java class that HDFS clients use to contact the Active NameNode Value of hdfs-site/dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.[nameservice] property
parameter.label: Failover Proxy Provider

parameter.name: webhdfs.username
parameter.description: doAs for proxy user for HDFS. By default, uses the currently logged-in Ambari user.
parameter.label: WebHDFS Username

parameter.name: view.conf.keyvalues
parameter.description: The key values that will be copied to hdfs connection configuration verbatim. Format : key1=value1; key2=value2
parameter.label: View Configs
